name: HOUSE OF QUEERS
description:
Collaborativ queer poem written during a seminar "queer emergences" in january 2021. 

In 1967, Alison Knowles, an american fluxus artist, Made The House Of Dust, one of the first poem generated with a computer. The quatrains are composed as “ A House of .../ In .../ Using.../ Inhabited by …”. Taking this form, we created our own version of this poem, using elements from the queer history. Stonewall, riots, Lou Sulivan, genderfucked,.... Come and wander around our poems, may long live the queers, may long live our fights !
